description: MEMORANDUM AND ORDER TO SHOW CAUSE ENTERED:  Plaintiff's motion for leave to proceed in forma pauperis (Doc.  2 ) is provisionally granted. Plaintiff must comply with the Court's NOD at Doc.  4  by May 17, 2024.  Plaintiff's Motion for  Appointment of Counsel (Doc.  3 ) is denied.  Plaintiff is granted until May 24, 2024, in which  to show good cause, in writing to the undersigned, why Plaintiff's Complaint should not be dismissed.     Signed by District Judge John W. Lungstrum on 04/25/24.  Mailed to pro se party  Michael Anthony Allen  by regular mail.   (smnd) Modified on 4/25/2024 to correct docket text to match document title (kas).
short_description: Order on Motion for Leave to Proceed in forma pauperis
